price: Nítorí náà, mélòó mélòó nínú ìlú tí A ti parẹ́ nígbà tí wọ́n jẹ́ alábòsí; àwọn ilé wọn dàwó lulẹ̀ pẹ̀lú òrùlé rẹ̀. (Mélòó mélòó nínú) kànǹga tí wọ́n ti patì (nípasẹ̀ ìparun) àti ilé pẹ̀tẹ́ẹ̀sì oníbíríkì (tó ti dahoro)!
arabic: فَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَا وَهِيَ ظَالِمَةٞ فَهِيَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَبِئۡرٖ مُّعَطَّلَةٖ وَقَصۡرٖ مَّشِيدٍ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: faka-ayyin min qaryatin ahlaknāhā wahiya ẓālimatun fahiya khāwiyatun ʿalā ʿurūshihā wabi'rin muʿaṭṭalatin waqaṣrin mashīdin
